description: Reactive Resume is a free and open source resume builder that's built to make the mundane tasks of creating, updating and sharing your resume as easy as 1, 2, 3.

footer.license: By the community, for the community.

subtitle: A free and open source resume builder.
title: Reactive Resume

error.upload-file-size: Please upload only files under 2 megabytes.
error.upload-photo-size: Please upload only photos under 2 megabytes, preferrably square.

success.resume-link-copied: A link to your resume has been copied to your clipboard.
